newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - PaineWebber starts drug stocks.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PaineWebber starts drug stocks.

text.p: -- PaineWebber confirmed it started coverage of eight pharmaceutical companies.
-- Started Warner-Lambert Co, Merck and Co Inc and American Home Products Corp as neutral.
-- Also started Pfizer Inc, Bristol-Myers Squibb Co and Eli Lilly and Co as neutral.
-- Started Pharmacia & Upjohn Inc as unattractive.
-- Schering-Plough rose 1/8 to 77-1/8, American Home Products rose 1/2 to 64-1/8, Merck rose 1/4 to 93-1/4 and Eli Lilly rose 1/2 to 89-1/2.
-- Pfizer rose 3/4 to 91-7/8, Bristol-Myers rose 1-3/4 to 129-3/4, Warner-Lambert rose 5/8 to 86 and NYSE-listed shares in Pharmacia fell 3/8 to 36-1/8.
